Description: TapStack.yml — Monitoring & Observability stack for distributed payments. CORE: CloudWatch, EventBridge. OPTIONAL: Contributor Insights. Builds all-new resources; no external dependencies. Names are suffixed with EnvironmentSuffix. EnvironmentSuffix is validated via a safe regex (no hard-coded allowed values). All log groups retain 90 days. Critical alarms target ≤60s detection.

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Lowercase environment suffix (e.g., prod-us); used in all resource names.
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must be 3–30 chars of lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens.

MetricNamespace.Description: Custom CloudWatch metric namespace for derived metrics.

PrimaryEmailCritical.Description: Email for CRITICAL alerts (must be confirmed in SNS).

PrimaryEmailWarning.Description: Email for WARNING alerts (must be confirmed in SNS).

PrimaryEmailInfo.Description: Email for INFO alerts (must be confirmed in SNS).

AlarmDescription.Fn::Sub: Composite service health score alarm for ${EnvironmentSuffix} (lower is worse).

AlarmRule.Fn::Sub: ALARM("${AlarmErrorRateCritical.Arn}") OR ALARM("${AlarmLatencyP95Critical.Arn}") OR ALARM("${AlarmSuccessRateCritical.Arn}") OR ALARM("${AlarmServiceHealthCritical.Arn}")

Code.ZipFile:
import json, time
def handler(event, context):
    detail = event.get("detail", {})
    alarm_name = detail.get("alarmName", "unknown")
    reason = detail.get("state", {}).get("reason", "")
    print(f"[Remediator] Alarm: {alarm_name} :: {reason}")
    return {"ok": True, "alarm": alarm_name, "ts": int(time.time())}

Description.Fn::Sub: On CloudWatch Alarm state change, invoke remediation lambda (${EnvironmentSuffix}).
